Absolutely loved this restaurant. I'm a HUGE cheese and wine fan and this place definitely caters to that. The best deal is their prix fixe menu for 23 euros. You get a big bottle of water, their own wine (which is delicious), a big salad to share, then the plate of yummy cheeses and amazing meats that pair well together. To top it all off you get some dessert with chocolate cake and custard along with coffee of your choice. I got their espresso which was great. Would definitely recommend this restaurant. The staff is very friendly and helpful and the venue itself es muy bonito! If you're in the area go! go! go! But get there before their first seating at 9pm... fills up quick and for good reason!
